Posts.RecruitPostName: Senior Cloud Solution Architect
Posts.Responsibility:
Tencent Cloud is seeking a customer facing Senior Cloud Solution Architect with extensive project consulting/implementation experience on at least one of the major public cloud platforms, plus full stack design and delivery skills. This senior SA role will work with the sales team closely to provide full lifecycle support for our customers, which could include understanding the customers’ business use cases, collecting the technical requirements, providing technical architecture recommendations based on Tencent Cloud/industry best practice, assisting implementation and deployment in customers QA and/or production environments, as well as issue trouble-shooting when necessary.

Having worked extensively as a solutions consultant, the right candidate will excel at working with customers to. They will collaboratively define prioritized implementation plans, ensure that the customer's own engineering and business teams consider all key cloud related critical path actions (such as access controls, private/public network separation, and data replication/recovery zones, etc.), and define the necessary functional test and integration requirements,. They will have led the successful delivery completion of multiple multi availability zone, cross region, PaaS based implementations, and in the delivery of handover documentation to stakeholder groups throughout each project stage.

Based in Palo Alto, CA, this person will work closely with the local sales, solutions, and technical teams, to service the global project pipeline.  At the same time, they will also proactively define industry level solutions, combining Tencent and third party products, to enable wider service adoption.

Posts.RecruitPostName: TiMi G1 Montreal – Senior Technical UI Designer
Posts.Responsibility:
Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Senior Technical UI Designer to develop a AAA, open-world game based on a new IP. The project will be released on multiple platforms, with an objective to reach a global audience. As a Senior Technical UI Designer, you will work closely with teams of experts to deliver an outstanding AAA player experience.
TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you someone who loves participating in building new worlds, understands what captivates players, and cares deeply about gaming as a medium ? Are you ready to channel your passion and energy into creating expansive open world games for global audiences? If you are excited about creating experiences that connect with millions of players. Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor.

What will you do?
The Senior Technical UI Designer works in collaboration with our User Interface Director to design and implement intuitive and delightful UI flows.
Autonomous and detail oriented, they prototype and implement Signs & Feedback, UI & Menu elements that match our Art Direction and Technical Direction.
They are comfortable working in multidisciplinary groups. They work closely with engineers, bringing technical expertise to create complex in engine UI systems and improve the UI pipeline.



Work closely with other UI Designers, UX Designers and engineers to develop production workflow within the latest Unreal Engine.
Create and maintain a framework of UI components that is used across our game using visual scripting and in engine data.
Craft and iterate on high-fidelity prototypes and polished designs to enhance  player interactions and immersion.
Work with UX designers to visualize various interface solutions.
Work with art leadership to achieve desired visual direction and ensure consistency. 
Identify and solve issues and push for improvements in the UI workflow. 
Participate in feature creation with cross-disciplinary teams (Gameplay, Animation, Sound, VFX, Level Design …) to deliver coherent and compelling player experiences. Canada-Quebec-Remote
